channel.title: BIOMA 2022 | All info about conference
channel.description: TThe 10th International Conference on Bioinspired Optimization Methods and Their Applications

item.title:
BIOMA 2022
The 10th International Conference on Bioinspired Optimization Methods and Their Applications
About BIOMA Conference
item.description:
BIOMA is a key conference focusing on bioinspired optimization methods and their applications. This international conference provides an opportunity for the global research community in bioinspired optimization to discuss recent research results and develop new ideas and collaborations in a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. [Call for papers] [More info]

Conference Topics

BIOMA 2022 welcomes papers covering all aspects of bioinspired optimization research, such as new algorithmic developments, high-impact applications, new research challenges, theoretical developments, implementation issues, and experimental studies. Papers addressing real-world applications are especially welcome. Areas of interest include:

  • evolutionary computation
  • swarm intelligence
  • neural computation
    • ...

item.title: Conference Venue
item.description:
BIOMA 2022 will be hosted by the University of Maribor, Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, Slovenia. The faculty is located in the old city center of Maribor, on the bank of the Drava river. The central railway station and bus station are within walking distance of 2km from the venue. Besides public transportation, there are also many taxi services.

For accommodation tips, look at the following website.

Event Location

University of Maribor
Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
Koroška cesta 46, SI-2000 Maribor, SLOVENIA

item.title: Keynote Speakers
item.description:
Carola Doerr

Sorbonne Université, France

Title: Surfing at the Interface between Theory and Practice in Evolutionary Computation

Abstract: Understanding evolutionary computation approaches by theoretical means is a challenging task. Problems and algorithms that can be rigorously analyzed are typically not representative of those encountered in practice. We will discuss why it is nevertheless rewarding to study EC methods by mathematical means and how research at the interface between theory, benchmarking, and practical applications helps us obtain a much more complete understanding for which algorithmic ideas to favor...

item.title: Registration
item.description:
Each accepted paper has to be accompanied with a regular registration fee by the deadline and presented at the conference by one of the authors.

Registration fee till 31 August 2022 after 31 August 2022
regular 350 EUR 400 EUR
student (with valid ID) 250 EUR 300 EUR
accompanying person 50 EUR 50 EUR

item.description:
Important Dates

item.title: Author Guidelines
item.description:
Paper Submission

Full papers in English not exceeding 15 pages (including references) are invited. Submissions are expected in PDF format through EasyChair. All submissions will be peer-reviewed by three members of the international Program Committee.

Author Instructions

Authors should consult Springer’s authors’ guidelines and use the proceedings templates, either for LaTeX or Word, for the preparation of their papers. Springer encourages authors to include their ORCIDs in the papers. LaTeX templates for Springer’s proceedings are also available in Overleaf.

Proceedings

The proceedings will be published in the Springer Lectures Notes...
